title: FPS and Ping are fine, but still lagging/freezing?
body:
So this has been happening a lot lately, and I figured it's about time to say something. For like, the last 4 days randomly league would freeze or lag. My ping would be fine and so would my FPS but occasionally my champ will just stand there for a good 5-10 seconds and do nothing. After, it'll unfreeze and I'd either be dead and everything suddenly speeds up... For example, minions are still attacking but their health doesn't move, and when I'm done lagging/freezing then it zooms down speedy quick and the minions are suddenly low.

**Reminder, it's not ping lag spikes when this happens, my FPS and Ping couldn't be better whenever this happens. It'll happen when I have 80 ping and like 52 FPS. **

I dont know what's going on but it's making it entirely frustrating to play, rito pls ):


PS. Occasionally I have been getting randomly high ping too, but it's not as much of as issue as this. Common, but not as common as the issue I'm asking about. At least with ping lag spikes I know it's ping lag spikes, I don't know whats going on here???

replies.body: 1. This problem happens to me too.When it happens your champion just stuck there sometimes go straight forward and you can't control it.I can only watch my champion was beat into death. The screen is not freezing but only my champion.The ping and FPS was normal will it happens,my roommate has the same problem. I think its problem is even worse than normal lagging, because after normal lagging everything happens very fast,you might find you already dead.When this happens you have to watch your champion go straight into their turret but you cant do anything. This experience is a torture. SO PLS FIX IT
this is my problem to

just logged in to like this comment,lol thats very true
{{champion:203}}

the game is getting to be pretty much unplayable.

every 20 to 30 seconds "Attempting to reconnect"  no ping or FPS issues and as always, LoL is the only program having connection problems like this.
this has been happening to me all the previous 7 games i played after the 7.20 update

Has this really been up for 2 years now and not a single response from Riot? Shocking... Like really, I'd understand if they just say "we don't know why this is happening, but we're looking into it." At least then we'd have their acknowledgement of the problem. But to completely ignore such a devastating problem for players seems kind of rude.

Got a new laptop as of last Christmas -- a good one. When on my home wifi my ping is fantastic at 36, fps around 100. But I've gotten these weird non-ping/fps related lag spikes at least 4 times today. Only got out alive for 2 of them. Tried so many things to fix it, but regardless I still get it several times a day. 

It also takes like 30 seconds for me to join the lobby after I've finished a game, which makes no sense considering my connection is great. This happens every single game. Wondering if maybe there's some kind of relation? Ironically, when I was in school where the wifi is garbage at times, this never happened. So not sure if the problem is on my end here at home or on LOL's end. Some feedback would be nice... but who am I kidding haha, that's not gonna happen.

Am having the same problem. Ping sits at 16ms, 60 fps and I just can't do jack shit.  I can walk around with my character, i can click on minions but the health bar doesn't drop. After a good 30 seconds EVERYTHING that has happened, happens at once, so also enemies that came from fog of war. How do I fix this and why doesn't a Riot employee respond to this thread (to my knowledge)?

I have exactly the same problem. I can run around I can see my health bar drop if something hits me I don't see what hit me tho. So If the health drops rapidly I use flash since obviously someone is after me. I started to notice that If I click around my actions still happen in real time, I just see myself move if I press A skill my character does it ingame for others but not on my screen, so I started telling my friend to locate the enemies via voice chat to me... I literaly play like a blind man. Also if the lag happens when I'm dead and I respawn it shows I'm dead on 0 death timer for about 10s. This shit happens every year and lasts for a week, day month and it really irritating to try games in hope its gone again... RIOT HELP PLS

I literaly play like a blind man. Also if the lag happens when I'm dead and I respawn it shows I'm dead on 0 death timer for about 10s. This shit happens every year and lasts for a week, day month and it really irritating to try games in hope its gone again... RIOT HELP PLS

Hmmmm this sounds an awful lot like packet loss to me. Essentially, packet loss is something that happens when parts of your connection get lost or damaged when it's on its way to our servers. Without all of that data, some pretty weird stuff starts happening like your champion not responding to your commands immediately. There's not a whole lot we can typically do about packet loss on our end since it happens before it hits our servers.

Grab the network logs from that game if possible, and have this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them really quick so we can check for any packet loss. If you can, post a screenshot of what it shows you afterward and I can take a look with you!

Thank you for your response. So you are right, the logs do show a problem, weird that my ingame ping indicator never jumped over 20ms https://image.prntscr.com/image/SWaWGR6MRp_mT3FhUPSxIg.png
Any tips on how to fix this?

I will play more games and check each individual game to see what the logs and my experience have to say.

Most of the time packet loss is an issue on the ISP side of things, since it happens due to how they're sending your connection to our servers. Try reaching out to them with that packet loss data and let us know if they're not working with you.

Thanks! I contacted my ISP again and again this time I was more persistent since you told me that the problem is almost certainly on their side, and the guy said ok we can try resetting the modem on our side, so since then I have no more problems! Note to all is be persistent and demand that they reset things on their side since they always tell you to reset your modem which barely ever helps.

pls fix this rito
then I can carry OP

So riot you claim to have dedicated Rioters to help and yet look nothing for two years now. You guys have people here that pay to play your game, and yet...this is how you repay them when they seriously just want to enjoy the system you've created. Can you please give an answer to how to fix this me and many others would love to know.

36 ping 100% of the time
167 fps

Friends and myself will experience loss of control of the character while playing this game. I believe this to be server side, it's the same bs server issues from a year or so back. Rito should pick a good slow day, shut it all down and just upgrade/fix whatever so we can all play happily.
I'm pretty sure it's from their part, I've seen a lot of people In EuNe (including myself) experience this lag. And truly, it's the least you want to have in a ranked game.

Unfortunately, happens to me as well. I know it's not ping and it's extremely aggravating whenever i try to play. Doubt it will be fixed ever by rito...I feel like i should just stop the attempts in League...Good Luck in finding a way though, you guys!
I've noticed it started happening about 2 - 3 weeks back. Indeed it's very frustrating, I can still play . I also noticed it happens mostly in the early parts of the game. Best of luck !
I have the same problem, finally I fixed it with disable the Movement Prediction in game setting, hope that helps.

So if anyone still have this problem i found solution (it work for me atleast) 

The only thing i did is repair and now it goes normal 60 fps 50 ping

I had this issue 2 years ago with delay catchup sometimes taking up to 2 minutes. My friend convinced me to reinstall and its still the same issue. It isn't too bad in ARAM but regular games are just hell.

BUMP. THIS EXACT THING IS HAPPENING TO ME. I TRIED TALKING TO RIOT SUPP FOR A WHILE. I MIGHT SEND ANOTHER TICKET. PING AND FPS ARE REALLY GOOD, BUT THE GAME STARTS OK WITH LIL LAG AND THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN BOOM A SHIT TON OF LAG HITS YOU AND YOU FREEZE AND CANT MOVE THEN EVERYTHING THAT HAPPENED SPEEDS BY 10 SECS LATER. AFTER THE GAME ENDS IT SAYS ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT. PLS RIOT HELP US. I DONT THINK THE RIOT SUPP GUYS KNOW HOW TO FIX THIS TBH. :(

yo dude im having the same fucking problem over here on EUW. my internet connection is the highest quality, in game I have 20 ms and 100fps, and these don't shift at all. lately I have been randomly "lagging" and having those "attempting to reconnect" issues. every time anything happens, this problem would occur, however, and this is what I do not get, during these so called "lags" my fps would be a constant 100 and my ms would also be a constant 20! they do not shift whatsoever! I have no idea what the hell is going on, srsly , the ingame ms is suggesting good quality connection, yet im randomly having these bugs or whatever, is the server up or something? I dunno, hoping someone can give me an explanation. rito pls focus on fixing the game and not banning tyler1

just a hint, other programmes and shit work perfectly fine. I just also wanted to add that these "bugs" would happen randomly, the game would be fine for the most part but I would randomly have these "bugs" without any change in fps or ms

is there any way to contact a rioter and get them to fucking do something about this? or are they all lazy fat disgusting nerds? Riot conspiracy: rioters using lag switches to help them climb and take over the league universe. Rioters are just league players who aren't good enough to be pro's right? would make sense.

I have the same problem, I change the quality of the video, closed all programs in the background that could be causing problems, and nothing happened. My ping is acceptable and the fps too, but I don't know what is the problem. We should keep on commenting so rito can do something about this, because in the past patches I had no problems with this and it is annoying because in game I can't farm correctly or use abilities. Hope the problem can be solved in the next patches or something like that.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
60 fps 53ping freezing every 2nd second lagging like mad lost all my LP ty riot best company

I got the same exact lag of all of you.. lag spike and freezing for 2-3 sec.. oh and i got this since 6.2 so... even if i got use too its soooo annoying... i changed my internet connection 3 times and its still there so its not from it... Cmon.. do somethin...

I have 300-450 FPS and 30 ping and never had problems until a few weeks ago like yourself.  Reinstalled LoL and updated graphics card, but this didn't solve the issue. 

MY SOLUTION:  i just lowered my FPS limit from "Uncapped" to any limited value (i.e. 144 FPS or below) and it did the trick.  

I didn't think this would work since I have had these settings for a while, but something may have been reset at a patch (who knows).  This probably won't solve most people's issues, but it worked for me.  Hope this helps someone.

* Note I did not alter the quality.
Im having the same problem, ping is normal and i tried lowering quality and still same problem
i have same proplem ping is good and fbs good but is laaaaag i hate my self please tell me what can i do u will ban me

Hello community,
I've read all your posts and I wanna say that I've been feeling the EXACT same issues. And all this started since new patches, (specially since 5-6.xxx); I don't know what to do/ think. It's virtually unplayable nowadays. I've troubleshooted all possible steps in all guides, and I've sent tickets and NOTHING, and I repeat, NOTHING seem to work. I'm desperate, because I used to enjoy this game, for more than 3  years. But now, I'm starting to hate it; Ive never had a similar problem, this being the worst of all. That's not all, I usually play with 80-90 pings and 50-60 FPS. And that's ok for me, it's perfect for me to play actually, but whenever I'm in a game (specifically in a team fight), out of nowhere the game either freezes or lags in a massive way. Riot told me that the issues could've been problems with my ISP, but I already contacted them, and it's all good. 
Please Riot, I beg for a fix.
Riot, ive been playing lol for a while, but for some reason i have insane lag and my ping and fps is fine. But the game starts to freeze up on me as soon as minions spawn. Whats the problem?
i have same thing right now and i just played a game with everyone having the same issue i dont know why this happen every new patch :(

why riot why i have good ping and good fps too and there are some lagged ;(

So yeah same thing here, ping 92 (better than i normally get) and FPS 50. Using my college's connection and last semester (fall season 4) everything was fine. Recently however ive been experiencing odd lag.

To clarify, it seems like the game just stops receiving any input from me for short periods of time, not like the common lag where usually everyone is affected and  my game screen freezes. In this form of lag I can still actively see everyone moving around me, minions dieing, enemy champs moving etc, its just i can no longer control my character for a while (usually between 3-10 sec). This can get to be really annoying when in ranked i move up to punish a mistake and end up walking with the enemy champ to under their turret instead for a free kill...

Ive run quite a few tests to check for packet loss, majority of which come up clear.

Anyone know wtf is going on?

rito pls help

my frined just  Restart ur modem , i have been do it and its goes good 
i have like problem u have and i feel it thats why i post 
my ping 60 and fps 100  and getting freeze just Restart modem

no dude that wont work, you very obviously do not know what this chat is all about do you. its about people lagging when their ms and fps are not changing, when the ms is changes, it means you are lagging, but the whole point of this chat is that we are lagging when there is no change in ms, meaning we shouldn't be lagging, and likely are not lagging because there may be some other reason to the bugs as suggested by the no changes in ms. god damn man. hope this helped my frined, I have been do it and its goes good, u have problem not like us
